languages.text: {n}Паскаль, в противоположность, говорит тихо и холодно:{/n} "Ты неисправен, технобрат. Я подвергаю сомнению твои логические выводы".
{n}In contrast, Pasqal speaks quietly and coldly:{/n} "You are malfunctioning, tech-comrade. I deem your logical conclusions questionable."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль, в противоположность, говорит тихо и холодно:{/n} "Ты неисправен, технобрат. Я подвергаю сомнению твои логические выводы".

traits.locale_text: {n}In contrast, Pasqal speaks quietly and coldly.{/n} "You are malfunctioning, Tech-Brother. I deem your logical conclusions questionable."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}In contrast, Pasqal speaks quietly and coldly.{/n} "You are malfunctioning, Tech-Brother. I deem your logical conclusions questionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}In contrast, Pasqal speaks quietly and coldly:{/n} "You are malfunctioning, tech-comrade. I deem your logical conclusions questionable."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}対照的に、パスカルは静かに、そして冷ややかに話す。{/n}「あなたは機能不全に陥っています、技術同胞よ。あなたの理論的結論は疑わしいと考えています」
languages.original_text: {n}In contrast, Pasqal speaks quietly and coldly:{/n} "You are malfunctioning, tech-comrade. I deem your logical conclusions questionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}対照的に、パスカルは静かに、そして冷ややかに話す。{/n}「あなたは機能不全に陥っています、技術同胞よ。あなたの理論的結論は疑わしいと考えています」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}相比之下，帕斯卡的声音安静而冷漠。{/n}“发生故障的是你，技术伙伴。我认为你的逻辑结论站不住脚。”
languages.original_text: {n}In contrast, Pasqal speaks quietly and coldly:{/n} "You are malfunctioning, tech-comrade. I deem your logical conclusions questionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}相比之下，帕斯卡的声音安静而冷漠。{/n}“发生故障的是你，技术伙伴。我认为你的逻辑结论站不住脚。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal hingegen spricht leise und emotionslos.{/n} "Die Fehlfunktion habt Ihr, Techkamerad. Ich erachte Eure logischen Schlussfolgerungen für fragwürdig."
languages.original_text: {n}In contrast, Pasqal speaks quietly and coldly:{/n} "You are malfunctioning, tech-comrade. I deem your logical conclusions questionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal hingegen spricht leise und emotionslos.{/n} "Die Fehlfunkton habt Ihr, Techkamerad. Ich erachte Eure logischen Schlussfolgerungen für fragwürdig."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}A contrario, Pasqal s'exprime d'un ton froid et posé.{/n} « Vous déraisonnez, technoconfrère. Vos déductions logiques sont des plus discutables. »
languages.original_text: {n}In contrast, Pasqal speaks quietly and coldly:{/n} "You are malfunctioning, tech-comrade. I deem your logical conclusions questionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}A contrario, Pasqal s'exprime d'un ton froid et posé.{/n} « Vous déraisonnez, technoconfrère. Vos déductions logiques sont des plus discutables. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}En contraste, Pasqal habla con calma y frialdad.{/n} «Estás averiado, tecnocamarada. Encuentro tus conclusiones lógicas cuestionables».
languages.original_text: {n}In contrast, Pasqal speaks quietly and coldly:{/n} "You are malfunctioning, tech-comrade. I deem your logical conclusions questionable."

traits.locale_text: {n}En contraste, Pasqal habla con calma y frialdad.{/n} «Estás averiado, tecnocamarada. Encuentro tus conclusiones lógicas cuestionables».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ise tam tersi, sessizce ve soğuk konuşuyor.{/n} "Arıza yapmışsın tekno yoldaşım. Mantıksal çıkarımlarını şaibeli bulmaktayım."
languages.original_text: {n}In contrast, Pasqal speaks quietly and coldly:{/n} "You are malfunctioning, tech-comrade. I deem your logical conclusions questionable."
